title: Q1 - Can the Board initiate an investigation on its own, or only based on complaints?
description: The Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023 (DPDPA) gives the Data Protection Board of India (DPBI) a broad mandate to act both on complaints and on its own initiative, depending on the source of information it receives.
